meanings.definition: Run at full speed over a short distance.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys sprinting to the finish line during races.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often practice sprinting to improve their speed.
meanings.sent3: The cheetah challenged the gazelle to a sprinting race.
meanings.sent4: His heart was sprinting with excitement as he crossed the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The sprinting cheetah was a blur of motion on the savannah.

meanings.definition: The act of running at full speed over a short distance.
meanings.sent1: Watching the sprinting of the track stars was exhilarating.
meanings.sent2: Sprinting requires explosive power and quick reflexes.
meanings.sent3: The sprinting competition at the school field day was intense.
meanings.sent4: The sprinting of the children to the ice cream truck was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The sprinting of the cheetah is unmatched in the animal kingdom.
